title: FS: T206 Poland Baltimore Interesting Writing

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Poland Baltimore Interesting Writing
posts.post_content:
FS: T206 Poland Piedmont 350 Card has Typed: Member (Buf) Photo 190 and 6 in pencil. I assume they used a photo from 1906 to sketch image for the T206 card. Also has some notes on card back. Card is crease free vg condition.. Prefer paypal no fee, check, money order. Thanks Ralph  PM or e-mail  [url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]

$23 Shipped with USPS TrackingSale Pending
